doc:
Rebecca Budig https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rebecca_Budig 0 Rebecca Jo Budig (; born June 26, 1973) is an American actress and television presenter, best known for both her roles as Michelle Bauer Santos on the CBS soap opera Guiding Light from 1995 to 1998 and as Greenlee Smythe Lavery on the ABC soap opera All My Children from 1999 to the 2011 network ending. From 2015 to 2017, she portrayed the role of Hayden Barnes on General Hospital, another ABC soap opera. Rebecca_Jo_Budig ( ; born June_26_,_1973 ) is an_American_actress_and_television_presenter , best_known for both_her_roles as Michelle_Bauer_Santos on the_CBS_soap_opera Guiding Light from 1995 to 1998 and as Greenlee_Smythe_Lavery on the_ABC_soap_opera All_My_Children from 1999 to the_2011_network ending . From 2015 to 2017 , she portrayed the_role of Hayden_Barnes on General_Hospital , another_ABC_soap_opera .
